description.value:
Infected Character gains new attack: (Pistol; 10m;S/-/-;2d10 E;Pen 2; Corrosive, Spray, Toxic(2)). Cannot Jam, any that fail the Toxic Toughness Test contract Disease. If damage roll is ever 2 7's, Character instantly dies in a gorey, pus filled explosion. Everyone within 3d10m is hit by weapon. Cured by 2 Week rest and -20 Medicae Test.

Requirements

Acquired in batch of 5. Any exposed to disease must make listed Toughness Test or catch it. Nurgle Dedicated suffer disease as normal, although do not see it as suffering.

Effect: Extremely Rare

Notes: -
